name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 77: Wild Bird Thief

content.html:
Dear Internet, On this week’s show we discuss stealing your neighbors wild birds, a demon at the campground, and dealing with issues in the boardroom. We would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick, Jennifer, Michael, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
